hero.title: Never Miss Another Customer —
hero.description: TalkServe's AI receptionist responds instantly across calls, texts, and WhatsApp. It books appointments or orders, answers questions, and follows up — 24/7. Trusted by healthcare clinics, restaurants, and service businesses across North America.

meetTalkServe.title: Meet TalkServe
meetTalkServe.subtitle: Your AI receptionist for Voice, SMS & WhatsApp — available 24/7.
meetTalkServe.feature1: Answers instantly — no hold music, no voicemail, no missed texts or WhatsApp messages.
meetTalkServe.feature2: Books & takes orders — syncs with your calendar, booking app, or POS across all channels.
meetTalkServe.feature3: Handles FAQs — services, hours, prices, menus, directions — by call, SMS, or WhatsApp.
meetTalkServe.feature4: Confirms & reminds — automated SMS/WhatsApp reminders cut no-shows and missed appointments.
meetTalkServe.feature5: Routes priority cases — urgent calls or messages go directly to your team.
meetTalkServe.feature6: Works 24/7/365 — peak hours, weekends, holidays, and after-hours coverage.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.step1Desc: Forward your phone number and link your SMS & WhatsApp Business accounts to TalkServe.
howItWorks.step2Desc: We customize its voice, responses, menu, and knowledge base for calls, texts, and WhatsApp chats.
howItWorks.step3Desc: Start handling real calls, SMS, and WhatsApp messages within one business day.
